EmailTemplate.name: BB Youth Board 2015-16 24/11/2015 Session 1
EmailTemplate.subject: BB Youth Board 2015-16 24/11 session 1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Once again welcome to the youth board,
Our first meeting will be held at: Time: 5pm on the 24th November (Next Tuesday) Location : New Eltham Methodist Church, 435-439 Footscray Road, New Eltham, SE93UL
During this session we will be letting you know what to expect for the rest of the year, and informing you about ignite. We will also be having a phone party, so please bring your mobiles (with credit) as you will be using these for this session. There will also be food there.
Please also sign up to Ignite, which is an excellent event, providing you with CV skills, Personal Statements, Interview skills and many more. Please click on to the link below to get you FREE ticket
http://www.tcssouthlondon.co.uk/ignite-2015
We look forward to meeting you at the first youth Board session.
